attributes.action: 6 monthly Covid vaccines for UK kids.
attributes.additional_details:
Regular vaccines every 6 months for all.
Mitigations in schools such as bubbles, one way systems, isolation of close contacts, masks.
attributes.background: You said you don't want to affect children's education but you are. This half term has caused mass disruption to childrens education and will continue to do unless you agree to a regular vaccine program for children.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to offer covid vaccines to children every 6 months, but we're not sure if you want it to be offered or would like it to be a condition of attending school.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to offer covid-19 vaccination/ boosters to all children every six months, if that's something you'd like to happen.
